title: 91/64/EEC: Council Decision of 18 December 1990 concerning the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Federative Republic of Brazil on trade in textile products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 18 December 1990 concerning the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Federative Republic of Brazil on trade in textile products (91/64/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Economic Community, and in particular Article 113 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas the Agreement negotiated between the European Economic Community and the Federative Republic of Brazil on trade in textile products initialled in Brussels on 12 September 1986 and applied on a provisional basis by Decision 87/470/EEC (1), as from 1 January 1987, should be approved,
main_body:
The Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Federative Republic of Brazil on trade
in textile products is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to sign the above Agreement in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1990.
For the Council
The President
G. DE MICHELIS
(1) OJ NÂ° L 263, 14. 9. 1987, p. 1.
